column3: Latest;Kampot Province: A man was sent to hospital with severe burns after an incident at 4 pm on 26 April 2020 in Damnak Tra Village
column8: poured several liters of gasoline over his body and set himself on fire
column9: causing serious injuries.------The 42-year-old lives in the village.------When the neighbors saw the fire
column10: they rushed to save the men. His family took him to Kampot referral hospital. ------AREY
